text:
I believe the difference is with the SEO tool itself 

With Pro you have access to Marketing > website > SEO which runs a scan of your website.

With Starter, you only have the built in SEO recommendations at the page level (the old optimize tab, now on the left sidebar of the page editor).

If you have marketing pro, you also get access to SEO tools so you could retain it if you pair it with CMS starter

I've been working on a big migration in to HubSpot and the whole import process has put me off using HubSpot ever again... I've documented some of the things that the import is lacking / missing / breaking in the forum. Please give it an upvote if you want to improve the importing process and save yourself a headache next time you need it :slightly_smiling_face: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Improved-Smart-Copy-importing/idi-p/907403>
